name: Failed to Load Policy in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
description: The Windows Firewall service failed to load Group Policy.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2009)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2009)`
